name: Il Palazzo Boutique Apartments Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Il Palazzo was simply the perfect place for us to stay in Cairns! We asked for a room facing the pool (quieter) and although there was construction going on behind the hotel/pool, it didn't disturb us thanks to the heavy sliding glass doors facing on to the pool.
reviews.title: Perfect accom and service!

reviews.text: The apartments are spacious, clean and provide everything you could need for your stay. If you happen to think of anything else you need the staff couldn't be more helpful and accomdating. We were totally confused about which trips etc we wanted to take during our short four day stay. The lady on reception spent a good half hour taking us through all the various options and then happily booked our trips for us (and they were all brilliant too!). They had a ready smile first thing every morning and asked us about our day every evening when we returned.
reviews.title: Great location, fantastic reception staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: In terms of the room, the bed was comfy, shower was excellent, washer and dryer were very handy, kitchen was small but had everything we needed...really I couldn't recommend this place more!
reviews.title: Great Central Location.

likes.disliked: — Size of Bed and Bedroom, placement of Airconditioner in bedroom. Noisy Construction Site

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2005, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed here with my Dad for two nights and we loved the central location and the people on reception, particularly Frances, could not have been more helpful.
reviews.title: Perfeck!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The only fly in the ointment was that our reservation had been lost, so we were lucky a room was available. Our room faced the main road, a bit noisy, and I do recommend you ask specifically for a room at the back of the hotel, facing the pool.
reviews.title: Loved it!!!

reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel recently after reviewing comments in TripAdvisor and looking at various website photos - it looked pretty nice. We stayed in a room overlooking the main street which was a bad idea. Although it was great to see the action happening in Cairns, the balcony overlooked the main street and the traffic noise was so bad we had to keep our balcony door closed. With heaps of tour buses and heavy traffic, it was very noisy 24/7. There was also construction noise directly opposite which ran for 6-days a week. The hotel proprietors did not tell us about this disruption. The pool was also being repaired and we were not told about this either. The room was adequate however the carpet was moderately stained and the bathroom was not exactly spotless (we found hairs on the floor) and the brown silicone around the bath didn't look particularly stylish! Apart from that, the bed was comfortable, the shower had great pressure and we enjoyed our time in Cairns. We found Cairns to be very touristy with every second shop being a souvenir shop, but a good base for reef trips, etc. If you decide to stay at Il Palazzo, I would suggest asking for a room overlooking the pool - at the back of the hotel where you most likely would not encounter the traffic noise.
reviews.title: Good location - but noisy!

reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel for three nights in March. We all booked through the hotel itself, with one in our party having a few conversations with the owner directly prior to our arrival.
reviews.title: Not bad
Loved this place. Excellent location, service and value
reviews.text: We arrived in a pouring rain, and before we were given our keys, were told that the pool deck was torn up and the pool would be unuseable. We were surprised to hear this since no mention had been made when we booked. Since our credit cards had already been charged for the rooms and it was too rainy to look for another hotel, we just checked in.

reviews.title: Loved this hotel
reviews.text: Our room was satisfactory, although the only view was of the torn up pool area.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotel location is great, right in the middle of town and a short walk to the pier. It was very nice having laundry facilities right in the room.
reviews.title: Top Service - Perfection!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just returned from a three week stay in Australia. We spent the first week in Sydney then flew up to Cairns for a six day stay at the Il Palazzo Boutique Hotel. We would usually stay in one of the larger chain hotels but decided to try something different.
reviews.title: Lovely hotel. Very helpful staff.

reviews.text: The staff were very helpful and friendly and we used the Reception to book our tours and hire car. They also recommended various restaurants which were all excellent.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel!

reviews.text: The apartment was very clean and spacious, although the bedroom was a bit small in relation to the other rooms. The bathroom had a washing machine and drier in it which was very useful.
reviews.title: 100% great!
Wonderful, clean, bright
reviews.text: There is also a small swimming pool, seating area and BBQ for guests - but we didn't have time to make use of them.
All in all a very enjoyable stay.
reviews.title: Huge suite right in the middle of Cairns

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I chose Il Palazzo based on its ratings on Trip Advisor and on its location in central Cairns. Initially I had tried to book the Hotel Cairns, but in retrospect I feel that Il Palazzo has a significantly better location - right in the middle of everything. I need not make a list , it's close to everything from the grocery store to adult stores. The room was wonderful - the best part being the washer and dryer to do some laundry after a week in Australia. The hotel service was exceptional and very knowledgable about the dozens of trips that all seemed alike to me, a tourist. We had forgotten our cell phone charger at the last hotel and Il Palazzo retrieved a basket of "orphan" chargers from the back so we could find one that fit our phone. We were in a room that overlooked the pool and it was quiet for the entire trip, despite the bustle of the streets around us. The wireless internet was available in the lounge, althought I believe that if you have a front room you may get access to the wireless. There is a nominal fee charged per day. I was with my husband, and had no guests, but the room was such that you could shut of the bedroom area and people staying perhaps on the couch could still access the bathroom without bothering someone sleeping. My husband and I agreed that had we come across an apartment in our college days we would have definitely rented it. It's a good layout. Don't miss the japanese restaurant next door if you're into sushi! Try the Kingfish!
reviews.title: One of the best hotels I've stayed in

likes.liked: — The service - they really outdid themselves.
likes.disliked: — I would have prefered internet in the room, but it was fine the way it was.

reviews.text: Found the hotel online, read reviews in TripAdvisor and booked for 6 nights. Great location -- walkable to everything in Cairns. Staff lovely and helpful -- even arranged for a hair/color appointment on my arrival day (they were very good also!). My apartment faced the ocean so I had no noise problems. I would definitely stay here again.
reviews.title: Great Little Place
Very Good Hotel
reviews.text: Stayed in May 07 - great central location, very nice, spacious apartment and quiet (we had a room facing pool).

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were looking for a hotel in town so we could walk around to everything, rather than stay out in the 'burbs and require a cab - and that had kids running around all the time. We loved the location - very close to the promenade, restaurants, night market, port, car rental. Close, but not noisy at all because the rooms are back off the street. The room was clean, bathroom big and spacious. It was a suite so separtate bedroom and little kitchenette. Both were great. The livingroom was very comfy. Our room looked out to the pool and then the promenade beyond. We didn't use it but it looked nice enough. The owners were pretty helpful. Definitely would come back here next time in Cairns. Would highly recommend if you are looking for an in-town location.
reviews.title: Loved this location and amenities

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at Il Palazzo Boutique Hotel in early May 2007. Ideal location in the centre of Cairns a very clean and modern hotel. The accommodation and amenities was absolutely first class. The staff were excellent and went out of their way to help us especially with booking tours to The Great Barrier Reef, Karunda and a city tour. Thank you to all the staff. We highly recommend Il Palazzo and when next in Cairns this is where we will be staying.
reviews.title: Absolutely First Class

description: Il Palazzo is a stylish boutique hotel situated in the heart of Cairns. Its prime location means that guests are central to the bustling business district, Casino, Conference Centre, Reef Fleet Terminal, markets and shops. The exciting Esplanade with swimming Lagoon and boardwalk, a plethora of cosmopolitan restaurants and major international hotels are within easy walking distance.Il Palazzo is a modern boutique apartment hotel with stunning neoclassical European inspired architecture featuring cream and terracotta decor, impressive stone sculptures and classical fine wrought iron work throughout.There are 38 fully self-contained one bedroom apartments, each with air-conditioning, a fully equipped kitchen and laundry, a large shady balcony, mini bar, Austar TV, CD/DVD, telephone, in-room safe and daily servicing. We have recently undertaken a partial refurbishment with new carpets, bedcovers, flatscreen TVs and DVDs. Il Palazzo has one of the best locations in Cairns and features a beautiful Mediterranean style courtyard with a landscaped heated swimming pool. There is a roof top sundeck, BBQ area and gazebo. Business services are available as well as a tour desk, dry cleaning, FREE wireless internet and secure undercover parking.The staff take pride in offering guests a personal service and attention to detail is paramount.While visiting one of the most sought after destinations in the world -Cairns and the Great Barrier Reef - stay in a luxury apartment at Il Palazzo.
